entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
